name: copilot-api
description: A wrapper around GitHub Copilot API to make it OpenAI compatible, making it usable for other tools.
author: ekartashov <ekartashov@ethz.ch>

scripts.test: bun test test/lib/approval.test.ts test/lib/api-config.test.ts test/lib/forward-error.test.ts test/lib/http-error.test.ts test/lib/is-nullish.test.ts test/lib/models.test.ts test/lib/paths.test.ts test/lib/rate-limit.test.ts test/lib/sleep.test.ts test/lib/state.test.ts test/lib/token.test.ts test/lib/tokenizer.test.ts test/lib/vscode-version.test.ts test/routes test/services && ./scripts/test-api-key-rotation.sh

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | grep -E '\.(js|ts|mjs|cjs)$' | xargs -r bunx eslint --fix && git add -u
